name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Arrow TOWNS, Appellant
docket_number: Appeal from No. 154 E.D. Appeal Docket 1986

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Arrow TOWNS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Superior Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Lawrence R. Dworkin, Chester, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
537 A.2d 1361
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Arrow TOWNS, Appellant.

Argued Nov. 10, 1987.
Decided Feb. 26, 1988.
